original_title: 桐山瑠衣　オトナるい
overview: An image of Rui Kiriyama, who left the entertainment world for the first time in two years. Her innocent expression and a large bust with a gap are still alive. She's miraculously revived, and her baby-faced lolita atmosphere has evolved into an adult, and her charm will captivate you!
title: Rui Kiriyama: Grown Up Rui
